description:
Shinpei should have been shot by Mio`s shadow, but he finds himself on a ferry heading to Hitogashima. Later, he relives the events that happened before the shooting and witnesses Mio stabbing Totsumura to death with a kitchen knife. Totsumura`s shadow emerges from his dead body, while Mio turns to a shocked Shinpei with the same knife.
Source: Disney+
